Sentence: german police say a teenage lebanese gunman , who hijacked a bus today , was hoping to free a key september 11th suspect. the gunman is accused of commandeering the bus in the north german city of bremen and holding 16 people hostage during a 75-mile police chase down the autobahn. negotiators say he demanded the release of four prisoners , including ramzi binalshibh , a september 11th suspect apprehended last year in pakistan. police captured the 17-year-old hijacking suspect without firing a shot. all hostages were released unharmed .
